buttons.name: key release
buttons.info: use this button when you would like the concierge to provide a key to a visitor (a contractor or friend.) We will need to know when the key is to be released and how long for

options.name: when
options.question: roughly when would you like the key to be released?

options.name: duration
options.question: roughly how long for?

options.name: contact
options.question: how shall we contact you?

buttons.name: rubbish disposal
buttons.info: use this button if you require your rubbish to be picked up outside normal collection hours (i.e. if it's causing a smell)

options.name: when
options.question: when will you be in for us to come and collect it?

options.name: contact
options.question: what kind of rubbish is it

buttons.name: dry cleaning
buttons.info:
the concierge runs a dry cleaning service where we will pick up and clean clothes. If you would like to use the service, the prices are
  • socks £0.80
  • t-shirts £1.50
  • fur coats £25.00
  • suits: £30
we will send you the full cost before we proceed

options.name: how many
options.question: how many items need cleaning?

options.name: where
options.question: when should we come and collect your items?

options.name: contact
options.question: how do you want to be notified of the cost?

buttons.name: urgent delivery expected!
buttons.info: if you have an urgent parcel delivery and want to be contacted when it arrives, use this button

options.name: when
options.question: when is the estimated delivery time/date?

options.name: contact
options.question: how do you want to be notified when it arrives?

buttons.name: I can't get in!
buttons.info: use this if you are stuck outside the building and need to get in

options.name: contact
options.question: where are you?

buttons.name: trespasser
buttons.info: use this if you notice someone who you do not recognise.  <strong> do not approach the person <strong>.  Our security team are trained to deal with this situation

options.name: where
options.question: where did you see them?

options.name: contact
options.question: can you still see them now?

buttons.name: noise
buttons.info: use this button to report a noise nuisance. All button presses are logged and correlated against other reports. The lease prohibits excessive noise between 10pm and 7am

options.name: where
options.question: where is the noise coming from?

options.name: now
options.question: is it happening now?

options.name: before
options.question: has this noise occurred before?

buttons.name: escort me!
buttons.info: use this button if you wish to be escorted to your apartment by a member of the security team. only press when you are in the place you want to be escorted from . We will aim to be with you within 10 minutes

options.name: where
options.question: where would you like to be escorted from?

buttons.name: vandalism
buttons.info: use this button if you have noticed any vandalism in or around the estate

options.name: where
options.question: where has the vandalism occurred?

buttons.name: LEAK!
buttons.info: use this if you have noticed a leak. We aim to respond to all leaks immediately

options.name: contact
options.question: how bad is it?

options.name: contact
options.question: where is it coming from

buttons.name: water pressure
buttons.info: use this to notify us if your water pressure has dipped.  We will check this against all other reports to determine whether it is site wide

options.name: contact
options.question: how long have you noticed low pressure?

buttons.name: broadband down
buttons.info: use this to notify us if your broadband has stopped working.  We will check this against all other reports to determine whether it is site wide

options.name: contact
options.question: how long has it been down?

buttons.name: poor tv signal
buttons.info: use this to notify us if your tv signal is poor.  We will check this against all other reports to figure out whether it is just you.

options.name: contact
options.question: how long has it been poor?

buttons.name: visitor permit
buttons.info: use this if you are going to need a visitor permit. We will try our best to reserve a slot for you. If we cannot, we have secured discounted rates at the NCP garage. You can phone them on 0208 765431 and use the discount code: JJKHGYH

options.name: when
options.question: when will your visitor be arriving

options.name: duration
options.question: how long will they need the permit for?

buttons.name: valet
buttons.info: book a car valet. A full service (wash inside and out) costs £40

options.name: when
options.question: when will you need it?

buttons.name: bad smell
buttons.info: use this if you have noticed a bad smell <strong> inside <strong> the building

options.name: when
options.question: where is it coming from?

buttons.name: spillage
buttons.info: let us know if you have seen a spillage anywhere on site

options.name: where
options.question: what has spilled?

options.name: where
options.question: where is the spillage?

buttons.name: new tenants
buttons.info: use this to let us know about an impending change of occupancy.  We will meet and greet your new tenants and ensure that they get settled in comfortably

options.name: when
options.question: when will the current occupants be moving out

options.name: when
options.question: when will the new occupants be moving in?

buttons.name: I'm letting
buttons.info: use this if you'd like us to help advertise your property for rental

options.name: when
options.question: when will the your flat be coming available

buttons.name: I'm selling!
buttons.info: use this if you'd like us to help advertise the sale of your property

options.name: when
options.question: when will the your flat be coming available
